{{cpp/types/traits/is|1=is_union
|description= 
Checks whether {{tt|T}} is a [[cpp/language/union|union type]]. Provides the member constant {{c|value}}, which is equal to {{c|true}} if {{tt|T}} is a union type. Otherwise, {{c|value}} is equal to {{c|false}}.
|inherit_desc={{tt|T}} is a union type
}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

struct A {};
static_assert(!std::is_union_v&lt;A&gt;);

typedef union
{
    int a;
    float b;
} B;
static_assert(std::is_union_v&lt;B&gt;);

struct C { B d; };
static_assert(!std::is_union_v&lt;C&gt;);

static_assert(!std::is_union_v&lt;int&gt;);

int main() {}
}}
